description: Creates or updates a database's threat detection policy.

security_alert_policy_name.description: The name of the security alert policy.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

api_version.description: The API version to use for the request.

properties.description: Properties of the security alert policy.

subscription_id.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

database_name.description: The name of the database for which database Threat Detection policy is defined.
